org.anarres.dhcp.v6.service

Class AbstractDhcp6LeaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.dhcp.v6.service.AbstractDhcp6LeaseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dhcp6LeaseManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PooledDhcp6LeaseManager

    @Beta
public abstract class AbstractDhcp6LeaseManager
extends Object
implements Dhcp6LeaseManager
    Base DHCPv6 Lease manager managing IaNA and IaTA. Created by marosmars

        Handle unknown/undefined message. If a DHCPv6 message does not fall into any of the above methods, this one will be invoked. The implementations of LeaseManager might support additional DHCPv6 message types.
